name: RelatedArtifact.type
title: RelatedArtifact.type
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: documentation | justification | citation | predecessor | successor | derived-from | depends-on | composed-of | part-of | amends | amended-with | appends | appended-with | cites | cited-by | comments-on | comment-in | contains | contained-in | corrects | correction-in | replaces | replaced-with | retracts | retracted-by | signs | similar-to | supports | supported-with | transforms | transformed-into | transformed-with
element.definition: The type of relationship to the related artifact.
element.comment: The presence of both sides of a relationship type (e.g. successor and predecessor) is required to support use cases where one side of a relationship is not represented in FHIR. However, this feature SHALL NOT be used to create bi-directional resource links in FHIR instances.

extension.valueString: The type of relationship to the related artifact.
